name: Miller's Palm
description:
An escape room game with a twist. Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 51 Jam.

We had a late start with this one (mid-Sunday). Hopefully, you'll find some joy in what we managed to put in.

In this game, you may find out a certain amount of things about Miller the main character, or if you are lucky you may just solve it in one go.

Kr4ft3r - code

Orb - graphics

LD page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/millers-palm

Sound asset credits:

freesound.org:

abyeditsound - clock tick

andersmmg - background hum

BenjaminNelan - locked door, drop

LPHyper - door knock

Nox_Sound - drawer open
